attributes.action: NOT just drop the idea of a "bin tax" because he thinks it will be unpopular, instead work to make it practical, fair and popular  with people who care about the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea that those who choose to send more waste to landfill should pay more than those who recycle is basically sound AS LONG AS it is supported by enhanced recycling facilities and compensation for large families. With minimal effort households can drastically reduce the amount of waste they send to landfill. Those who make an effort to do this should be rewarded and those who do not should be penalised.
